General.Name: Westone Information Industry Inc
General.Description: CETC Cyberspace Security Technology Co., Ltd. provides network information security products and services to the government, military, and enterprises across various industries in China. The company offers data security, including personal privacy security protection, data leakage prevention, and data security circulation and sharing. The company was formerly known as Westone Information Industry Inc. and changed its name to CETC Cyberspace Security Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2023. CETC Cyberspace Security Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

1.Name: Ms. Zhi Hui  Liu
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
